website_summaries.verdict: Apple’s biggest iPad is the king of the hill with enough speed, space, and flexibility to support any student. It’s expensive but worth every penny.
pros: The Retina display is the most gorgeous screen we’ve ever seen on a tablet
Compatibility with Apple Pencil means you can use it to write notes or draw
It’s got wireless charging and facial recognition
cons: Some consider 12.9-inch a bit large and unwieldy

customer_reviews.title: IPad Pro 2018
customer_reviews.text: Great product, I use this mainly for photography, however, usb-c connection is so new, there aren’t peripherals to work with, only one I can find at this moment is SD card reader from Apple store, even that doesn’t work until after calling Apple tech support. I am hoping more peripherals available soon so I can export edited photos for backup other than iCloud.
customer_reviews.author: HBRichardson

customer_reviews.title: No headphone jack, shady advertising.
customer_reviews.text: Apple is so cheap...you now have to buy an adapter for headphone because the only input is the USB-C jack. They don’t tell you this when you buy it. You have to learn the hard way that there is no headphone jack. And, you cannot charge while using headphones because the charging input is being used for headphones. They also do not tell you that the screen size is diagonal, so a 12.9” screen is really under 11”. They are becoming too greedy and this will probably be my last Apple product ever because of shady advertising practices and undisclosed buy-ups that you need to function.
customer_reviews.author: IRENE RYDING

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful box, no ipad
customer_reviews.text: I received an shipment this morning of a new ipad pro. The box felt a little heavy, but it's my first ipad, so I didn't think anything of it. Upon opening the amazon box, there was a new looking ipad pro box, wrapped in plastic with a barcode, and all of the labels for the item on the backside of the box. It looked legit to me :(. So I cut the plastic and lifted the cover revealing a stack of printer paper in the box, and nothing else
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Hard to type
customer_reviews.text: I disliked the keyboard very hard for me to type and it kept dropping my wi-fi, so I returned it and am going to try an 11” this time
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Sliwinski

customer_reviews.title: WOW!!! (That’s what you need to know) WOW!!!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful! Wonderful! Amazing! I absolutely love it. Gorgeous picture...great sound...user friendly. I am a senior citizen and was concerned that I might not be up to date enough to benefit from this new iPad. No problem! My kids laugh at how much I love my new friend. I am having fun, learning lots of new things and enjoying some great entertainment. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Divabvrtn

customer_reviews.title: Love my iPad Pro 2018
customer_reviews.text: I had iPad Pro 12.9 1st gen and it’s still fast and good but that new 2018 iPad Pro is really beautiful. I like how fast I’m able to unlock it using face ID and display is more crisp and clear. I had MacBook Pro but I barely use it because I’m able to to do almost anything on my iPad Pro. The only thing I find frustrating is the very small 3ft charging cable (1st gen had 6ft)
customer_reviews.author: Uniqua

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! I love it. It’s has been a little difficult to find the accessories I want because it’s so new....either there isn’t an option yet or options are limited. I don’t love the boxy-feeling edges, but that’s just me - you pay for how Apple products feel or make you feel. It’s a little heavier than I expected, but I’ll live. I’d definitely buy this again if I had to do it over.
customer_reviews.author: Candace

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth can not connect
customer_reviews.text: iPad arrived in two paper box - one small box inside one big box, no cushion of any kind. Bluetooth just won't connect. Tried many ways: Turn the iPad Pro off and turn it back on, turn Bluetooth on/off, turn Airplane Mode on/off, turn Wi-Fi on/off, reset Network Setting, then turn Bluetooth on/off again... I'm taking it to a Apple Store tomorrow, will update later. Update: Apple Store tech support fixed bluetooth connection problem, ran system diagnostics, everything is fine now. Change from two stars to four stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Small things
customer_reviews.text: Purchases IPad Pro 12.9 + pen, July 2019 $1.400.02 That includes tax. Apple includes a ridiculously short 40" USB-C connector. Apple charges a lot of money for all their products Is it too much ask to include a 6 foot or 10-foot cord? Immediately purchased a 10-foot USB-C connector from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Who me?

customer_reviews.title: 2 star
customer_reviews.text: like older version better. i hate theres no headphones jack, no fingerprint reader, hate the price.
customer_reviews.author: AMZN CUSTOMER

customer_reviews.title: New Apple Products = zero durability
customer_reviews.text: Less than a year of owning and iPad 12.9 inch, my screen cracked. I alway's keep it in Apple's keyboard case, and did not drop it. This device is SO fragile. My confidence in Apple is gone. Probably my last Apple produce :-(.
customer_reviews.author: Tech Geek Guy

customer_reviews.title: Best apple purchase in years.
customer_reviews.text: Out of the products apple released in 2018 this is my favorite. This is my first iPad since 2012-2013 and the design, the weight, the extra large screen perfect for multitasking. Sound is great. And forget about the screen. Yes it’s sub 300 ppi but seriously it doesn’t matter. It sounds excellent. Great multimedia power house. With the pencil it’s even more useful! I started journaling again!
customer_reviews.author: 128imk1

customer_reviews.title: Screen freezes repeatedly
customer_reviews.text: The screen keeps freezing up for several seconds at a time. Never had this problem with an Apple product before...
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Ryder

customer_reviews.title: Defective Touch Screen out of the box.
customer_reviews.text: Issues out of the box with the touch screen. I could not even set it up... appeared to be a recycled return. Called Apple support and spent over an hour trying to figure out the problem.... Every time we think everything was working it would stop responding again. Great customer service from both Amazon and Apple, but I had to Return it; Touch screen is too important on an IPad...
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic.
customer_reviews.text: I felt guilty buying yet another device when the ones I have are “fine”. I struggled to justify it.. but wow, it’s really nice! Extremely snappy/fluid, appreciably more so than any other iOS device that I’ve used including the Xs. Aside from cost this thing is a joy to use!
customer_reviews.author: jmonster

customer_reviews.title: Best in class tablet device
customer_reviews.text: I am impressed with the design. This one has got a great display. It's not OLED, its LCD 5 microphones compared to the 2 microphones in the old genration.It has got face ID to unlock . I have been doing a lot of drawing after i got apple pencil with this and I love it. My only regret buying this is that I wish i went with the 11" version coz its easier to hold. Overall, it's really expensive but I am glad about the upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: The Prime Guy

customer_reviews.title: Amazing screen and fast
customer_reviews.text: I just bought this one as an upgrade to my old iPad and what a difference! This thing screams along fast with any task and the screen is so clear with a beautiful picture that it is almost breathtaking to sit and watch a movie on it! I have a bad back so have to lay down a lot and this makes the time go by easier whether working on typing, surfing the net, or just watching movies to pass the time. The 12.9" screen is quite a jump from the old iPad along with the 4 speakers. I am finding new things in movies that I have watched before and never noticed.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Ellick

customer_reviews.title: The best IPad on the market!!
customer_reviews.text: I only use the IPad Pro versions. This new bevel-less one, is the best by far. The battery is far better than the old one. The screen quality is darker, more robust than earlier versions. I did not get the cellular this time around because I felt it was draining the battery. I may be wrong about that so don’t quote me. It was just a feeling. I now use my phone as a hotspot instead when I have no WiFi. Could not be happier with it. All apps open far faster with this version. The CPU is a beast. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Nick C.

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: I am a Wacom user and have no issue with them, but since my back injury, I had to figure a way to work on the bed or couch here and there. Since my Wacom is 27 inch, not an option to carrying around. I choose Ipad pro. Since there were people complaining about tablet getting bent, I got a few gears to prevent issues. My Ipad pro works great. I am mainly using Procreate for drawing simple line art. Fast responding and no delay. Very happy with the result. I still work with my computer and Wacom but for simple line art job? it became a thing to do with Ipad Pro.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: I pad froze during first start up. apple told me I needed to buy a 30 dollar usb connector to hook it up to a computer. To in freeze the I pad. I guess $1300 dollars wasn’t enough.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better but not better ...
customer_reviews.text: Package arrived on time and undamaged. This gen 3 is so much faster than my older gen 1! I sure do miss the button though since it’s a pain to swipe diagonally on the screen to close an app. It seems like the screen is the same size but the border is gone which had that button! 3/4 of an inch smaller but I want the button back!!! GIMME THE DANG BUTTON BACK!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dutch

customer_reviews.title: order 512gb but got a 64gb
customer_reviews.text: So i order the 512gb but got a 64gb. So i decided to get a replacement for that one, but got another 64gb and then i order another replacement and got another 64gb. Not sure whats going on but feel like they don't have any
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The artists drawing tool I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this primarily for drawing/design work and I absolutely love it! It does a lot and will only do more when iPad OS is released. I love literally everything about this product. I have looked into getting Wacom drawing products where you can draw right on the screen and they all look clunky compared to this and require connection to a separate computer for use. To buy a Wacom product that has a computer built in costs three times the cost of the iPad Pro. I have done multiple art pieces on this and love using it with the Apple Pencil. It is the artist tool I have been looking for!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet for artists!!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty amazing tablet! The apple pencil feels great- second to the feel of Wacom products. Procreate is a nice and intuitive app as well. Personally, I enjoyed the new iPad Pro but I am returning the 12.9” I bought on Amazon to instead purchase the 11” one instead- I found it to be too large for my needs. If you prefer a larger screen for drawing I would recommend the larger one. For me, I already own a Wacom Cintiq 22” so I found it to be a bit redundant. I am looking for something more portable but I won’t deny the tablet itself was wonderful to draw with!
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic dual-complex math and note taking and text-following tool
customer_reviews.text: I use this item mostly for my own learning. Just like you see on the online tutorials, I open 1/2 the page o Goodnotes and the other half to either my online course content or my text book and take notes! Its great. I do wish I could use a full-scale Word (not 365 or Google Docs) but it's a great tool for just that. The Apple Pencil works great for fine note taking and diagram drawing. The Logitech slim folio keyboard works perfectly (one tiny known bugaboo is that it doesn't tilt the iPad and the best angles but that's easily addressed with anything you might have).
customer_reviews.author: blue_serotta

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy to replace your current phone.
customer_reviews.text: I specifically got this to replace my phone. This device is a data only device. Having it say "Wifi+Cellular" is misleading. It will only let you use cellular for internet only. Do not expect to send calls or messages through SMS, and you will need to get a new number and use a text/msg app. This thing is great, but the whole reason to get this thing was to completely replace my phone. I will never recommend thing thing to anyone. Don't say your device is cellular if it doesn't have cellular capabilities!
customer_reviews.author: Tajlora Raëlien Knüdsen

customer_reviews.title: Great for viewing and editing high res photos, and really fast.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cuz I heard the full photoshop for iPad would be released soon. I also didn't want to buy a new high resolution monitor to replace a perfectly good monitor. My photos from my Nikon Z6 look great on this iPad. It also handles 4K video with no problems, where my laptop, which works great for most thing I need it for, was struggling with 4K videos. I don’t use it as a laptop replacement, though for a lot of people it could fill that job with no problems. The pencil I got for it is really worth it also, it’s not like a magical device, but it is very handy and useful.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love love love! Replaced my MacBook Air
customer_reviews.text: I wish I knew how good iPad Pro was. I've been using this iPad pro to replace my MacBook Air. Bettet battery life, better screen experience and flexible rotation. I purchased apple keyboard with it. Only compliant is no escape key. Other than that, the touch screen make the website browsing more smooth. I can keep telling people how much I like this iPad for hours. Do some research, read some discussion before you purchase. It'll help you transition better!!
customer_reviews.author: DeLearn

customer_reviews.title: New iPad Pro is great
customer_reviews.text: I got my new iPad Pro at the end of April, after upgrading from my old original iPad Air and I have been learning how to use the Face recognition software and the new Apple 2 pencil. The Pro is great and I'm glad that splurged out on the 12.9" iPad Pro and I love it. Its great device with amazing screen images and despite my new iPad being bigger than my Air, it still really easy to use especially with the new smart keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: Rick D

customer_reviews.title: Apple iPad Pro great product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the iPad Pro 2018 12.9 inch tablet with the Apple Pencil for Christmas. I immediately noticed how easy it is to use. I have been using IBM pc’s since the ‘80s so this was a big jump for me. I use the iPad Pro for art, music and design. So far the iPad Pro has not disappointed. If you can get past the price point, it’s well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Iowahawkeye

customer_reviews.title: iPad Pro 12.9” is bending and contorting I hate this Product.
customer_reviews.text: This iPad starting bending and contorting, and had an extreme curve in it. The build quality of the new IPad Pro12.9 is built very poorly , I can’t believe apple has really let the quality of there products drop so low. I am very disappointed.................
customer_reviews.author: James Little Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Apple Pencil doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: The Apple Pencil doesn’t work out of the box generation 2 with generation there iPad Pro....MIGHTVE GOTTEN A DUD BUT I PURCHASED TWO PENCILS AND neither of them worked . i don’t even care that the same day this shipped surprisingly the new generation foUr came out.... i purchased from amazon product doesn’t work sensible thing would be a exchange Right? nope i Have to either send it to Apple which will cost me the same full price (1500) and then wait for a refund or send it back to amazon wait for a refund then repurchase All over again -_- wtf pissed isn’t even the word
customer_reviews.author: Diamond G.

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but if you want the best you got to pay for
customer_reviews.text: One of my best purchases on amazon This 2018 apple ipad 12.9 has more pros then cons Pros Apple ecosystem/ icloud Very fast Smooth interface Huge screen IPAD IOS13 is a game changer Goes really good with gen 2 Apple Pencil And ALOT more things I liked to name Cons EXPENSIVE still feels a little more restrictive then other tablets Other than that the iPad is just above and beyond any other tablets
customer_reviews.author: Victor ayala

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic tech for an artist!
customer_reviews.text: As an artist I'm so glad I purchased this new iPad Pro and Apple Pencil 2! Thankfully Amazon offered five monthly payments. Works fantastic for drawing especially with Procreate, the Paperlike matte protector and the ZUGU case. After stopping in Best Buy I'm so glad I got the bigger 12.9 rather than the 11 inch! If you are an artist get the 12.9! If you are a student or traveling a lot I would get the 11 inch. I love that I can draw and work but also watch Netflix and answer emails! It's so sleek and great to have around.
customer_reviews.author: C. Blake

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Shipped extremely quick!
customer_reviews.text: My iPad unexpectedly showed up 2 days early and I’m absolutely obsessed with it! I splurged and bought the apple keyboard folio (which is not sold on amazon yet unfortunately) and it is worth the money. I first bought a cheaper version that I ended up hating because it was way too bulky so now I just ended up paying for two cases...If you can afford it and you use your iPad for work/school I recommend getting the apple version of the case...
customer_reviews.author: Jana

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, but..
customer_reviews.text: Battery life is so so. Honestly, my biggest issue is the front facing camera likes to freeze. A lot. Other than that, really no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: DangerMouse___

customer_reviews.title: Apple but definitely a Great product
customer_reviews.text: It took me a good while to actually decide to buy this device. Especially since I’m not a huge fan of apple anymore after all those new devices that are meant to take the money out of customers pockets. But honestly , this is the best purchase of technology Ive made in a while. Amazing for taking notes, powerful, drawing, music DJ-ing, fast, fluent FPS. I haven’t touched my MacBook for quite some time, since this replaces basically everything (other than desktop programs). Fully satisfied also because of the GREAT battery life!
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: It get stuck there on the logo!
customer_reviews.text: Was setting up, when it restart and then just stuck there.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Best iPad ever
customer_reviews.text: Only the 1TB version has 6GB RAM. But this machine is an absolute beast. iPad OS in my opinion adds another $300 worth of value for me.
customer_reviews.author: Aunik Paul

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY AN APPLE PRODUCT FROM ANYONE BUT APPLE.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the iPad I November 2019 on payments for 6 months I believe. A month after my last payment the screen went black and the iPad won’t charge. Went through Apple, 5 or 6 people had me run the same tests every time. Finally the let me send it in. They couldn’t fix it and sent it back to me. Wow, the newest iPad Apple had less than a year old. No Apple stores open in surrounding area. $1032 8 months later and there is no help available to me. No recommendation from me. Might as well spit in the wind!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Blee

customer_reviews.title: Buyers Beware
customer_reviews.text: Beyond irate. I bought this iPad and when I opened it it had a scratch on the glass. I then tired to exchange it but it wouldn’t let me because it comes from Apple I guess. So as I’m on the phone with Amazon they offered me a $100 credit to help offset when I need to replace screen. All I wanted was a new one that didn’t have a scratch. Very bad experience at buying such expensive electronics.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff C.

customer_reviews.title: Battery Life is Excellent and it made my husband very HAPPY!
customer_reviews.text: The Screen quality is exceptional and that gives so much joy for my husband for re-living all the uploaded (unlisted) private video tapes that I've made digital with another great item purchased on Amazon; Elgate Video Capture. The light and the color is so much better with this screen quality. The Touch Screen also works great.
customer_reviews.author: Mariette Vedder

customer_reviews.title: Incredible machine
customer_reviews.text: I am so grateful to even be able to own one of these. Leaving a review because I love this machine and think it’s probably my favorite Apple product so far. I wish I could afford the macbook but I digress. My only issue really is battery life. I most am using Procreate and it sucks battery ! I expected that. Apart from that, this is such a solid product. It’s quick and solid. Feels amazing in the hand even though it’s so large . Great product, purchase it if you can afford it. I don’t own a computer and this allows me to do almost everything I would on a macbook... almost everything
customer_reviews.author: Orincy

customer_reviews.title: Brand new and perfect
customer_reviews.text: I got the IPad Pro 12.9 256GB in the mail and it was perfect. It’s brand spanking new and my wife had the full experience of opening a brand new iPad Pro. It came all sealed up and it was the perfect gift for my wife as she wanted it to be used with the Procreate app. She loves it and has no complaints because I bought the Apple pen 2 with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Data service limited to ATT?
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful device except I could not get it to work with the carrier Consumer Cellular. ATT pops up when you attempt to set up cellular service. After hours on the phone with both Apple Support and Consumer Cellular Support, I was told by Consumer Cellular support that this IPad would not work because ATT uses GSM technology. My web search shows that Consumer Cellular also uses GSM---so it should have worked. I think I received a poor explanation from the CC support; I also think this iPad is somehow locked to ATT service.
customer_reviews.author: alb

customer_reviews.title: Overall nice, but touch screen is not as good as our old one...
customer_reviews.text: Since day one the touch screen can pause for a second and not work... just in short moments.. but over time gets frustrating...
customer_reviews.author: Customer #999

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Decided to buy this one instead of the newly released one as the specs are the same sans the lidar camera which is totally unnecessary unless you are in that particular field that would require scans of items. Overall it’s the best iPad I have ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: ZPTN615Top Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Great machine
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful screen quality, and not too heavy. I didn’t get the pencil yet, but any bluetooth keyboard works. The on-screen keyboard is better than the iPad Air. The touch-screen can be finicky. Overall, I am very happy with this.
customer_reviews.author: MommaW

customer_reviews.title: Love my everyday working tool
customer_reviews.text: This is just perfect as expected with an apple Product. Battery life is great, tough, if you use it for digital art keep in mind you’re gonna have to charge it every 6 hours but, what other portable display can last that much? Do I have to mention that I have a Wacom cintiq Pro that I’m barely using any more? Uloh and if you have a late 2015 and above you can use it as a second display or graphic tablet (retouch or paint, you name it). Too bad my MacBook Pro is late 2014.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos  Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced iPad
customer_reviews.text: Like the ease of the iPad. ..but this is the pro, and there is nothing PRO about it...just a typical iPad. Typical apple hype about mediocrisy. Way too much money...save your money
customer_reviews.author: Ripper11

customer_reviews.title: It doesn’t replace a laptop like I had hoped. HOWEVER...it does more than I could imagine!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hoping that it would replace my laptop. Unfortunately, it just doesn’t function as a full computer. I cannot have multiple documents open at the same time and in that regard it doesn’t help my workflow. However, the IPad does more for my business than I ever could have imagined. I use it in partnership with my MacBook Pro. It has made my consulting work so much more streamlined and I can flow in between being an artist, a facilitator, a business woman, and consultant so much more dynamically.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: C’Mon.  It’s Apple!  Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: My husband got this for Christmas and to also use for his photography business. It works beautifully. The screen is so vivid, beautiful graphics. Someone suggested the 11” but he felt sure he wanted the largest and is so very happy with it. I have to agree. It’s not TOO large. It’s perfect. He also got a nice magnetic case and the Apple Pencil, also extremely satisfied with those as well. At this price point, people should be satisfied; right?
customer_reviews.author: csiss

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: I have a first generation iPad Pro. I have a problem with it scrolling. I tried everything to correct the problem but it never got fixed. So I decided to buy a new generation iPad Pro. Guess what? Same damn problem!!!! Just beware.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Apple quality and versatile device
customer_reviews.text: For my uses, I can’t really replace my MacBook Pro with this device, but that may change with iPadOS this fall. Nice and light when not attached to the Apple keyboard folio. I also use this to extend my MBP to a second screen when I work anywhere besides my desk, where I have 2 large monitors. Great device, but very expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Graves

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The whole system is great but... the battery life is extremely poor. Within an hour of usage, the battery can go down easily 50% NOT GOOD!!! Oh! Another Huge PROBLEM, the PEN!!! If you have a protective case, you might have to be taking that case out, to recharge that pen!!! What an awful design!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer.

customer_reviews.title: Best iPad yet😊
customer_reviews.text: I have the original iPad Pro 12.9” from 2016 - i got a great deal here in Amazon for the new iPad Pro (2018 model) and it is all they say. Noticeably faster and very responsive. I put it in a excellent Zugucase and protected the screen with the Ztotop - the case adds bulk to the iPad which is so amazingly thin but it will ensure it doesn’t get damaged if I have an accident.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Penn

customer_reviews.title: ✌️👍❤️
customer_reviews.text: So far so good 😊 I hope 🤞 I made the right choice purchasing this iPad and it doesn’t disappoint me. I need this for school work because laptops disappoint me; I always have issues with over heating and the damn fan. Before I purchased this iPad, I watched YouTube unboxing videos and one mentioned a bending situation. Fingers crossed 🤞 that doesn’t happen. That’s the only issue I’m worried about especially since I need this on the go.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: Great value low price cut and awesome light weight
customer_reviews.text: Glad to have new computer for low price than MacBook Pro over 5k!!. I think can use iPad Pro for everything carry support. This pad have bend little but it is great running machines. No problem no need replace yet i hear about screen. But it sure fine normal press touch screen. I am getting start learn how to use ipad with first time Apple Pencil and keyboard required too, different keyboard with backlight color, not apple crap keyboard without light c’ome.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander W.

customer_reviews.title: This one was a replacement/upgrade for my wife
customer_reviews.text: My wife has had her original iPAD for almost 7 years and it needed to be replaced. My wife had been eyeing the 12.9 iPad Pro in Costco for a while. Since it was a Christmas present this year, she has hardly had it off her lap. The image is super sharp, the colors amazing, and I can’t believe the battery life! I feel like you can’t go wrong with this.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Dutton

customer_reviews.title: This has replaced my laptop
customer_reviews.text: This is the best iPad yet! And I got it at such an awesome price! The screen is larger and the clarity so so much better than the previous iPads. This has replaced my laptop at home, and I use it at work too.
customer_reviews.author: Tex S.

customer_reviews.title: The size is right.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the size. I wanted something that was easy to read and something that would be big enough to download sheet music. This is super. I don’t have to lug several folders of music with me now when I’m playing. I like the size for reading books and news articles. I’m glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Long Time Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievably bad Apple service
customer_reviews.text: Shortly after the warranty expired, my IPAD PRO stopped working (would not charge). Local repair shops won't touch it. I tried to send it to Apple for service but the repair website appears to not work (cannot submit the order). Tried multiple times to contact Apple to find out how to get the unit serviced. Unable to find anyone who can tell me how to submit a repair order. Apple is supposed to send a shipping box. Can't get that done.
customer_reviews.author: Alpha9

customer_reviews.title: Bend gate is real
customer_reviews.text: when I first got it fell in love with it was a upgrade from my iPad Air . Months later I noticed that my iPad was bent contacted Apple the lady told me it was covered under warranty once I sent it in they email me saying it’s hardware damage . No product for that amount of money should be bending and the company won’t take responsibility for it . I’m wasting money on Apple product .
customer_reviews.author: Cedric barnes

customer_reviews.title: totally compatible
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this product is great. This version of apples IPAD is very resilient compared to the older version it replaced. Needed to upgrade because the previous ipad version would no longer accept OS upgrades and the other associated software support to maintain security. Transitioning from the previous 8 year old version was a snap.
customer_reviews.author: golf2xs

customer_reviews.title: Poor Resolution
customer_reviews.text: I’m an Apple’s fan. But I have to tell my truth. I was expecting to watch videos/movies with better resolution than in my iPhone. Well, they both cost me the same amount, but still, I’m disappointed. You can see the pixels, that’s irritating. Sound and pictures are extraordinary. Very loud, indeed, great to listen to the music. The speed is amazing too.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen

customer_reviews.title: What's there to say? It's an iPad
customer_reviews.text: If you have a Macbook Pro / Air, iPhone, etc., do you really need the iPad? For us, this was more of an indulgence purchase. We don't really need it, nor do we often use it. It is nice to have around though, and it's fun to play with. Buy all means get one if you'd like, but you're better off if you have a specific use for it.
customer_reviews.author: jib jose

customer_reviews.title: Flawless!
customer_reviews.text: Bought mainly to substitute for my aging windows-based laptop. The iPad is working flawlessly so far. I’ve transferred most of my needed files over. The iPad starts instantly without warmups and annoying notices for updates. Thus, I’m using it more often than with the laptop. Buying through Amazon also allows for multiple payments without interest.
customer_reviews.author: George J. Eaglin

customer_reviews.title: Desktop replacement?
customer_reviews.text: for most tasks where an iPad works, this is overkill. Hard to notice the horsepower this thing has. That said, I like overkill. I bought it to use as a desktop replacement with the iPadOS improvements. Maybe not quite there yet. Mouse interface is quirky. I am sure it will get better (or I will) over time.
customer_reviews.author: Fastluck13

customer_reviews.title: iPad Pro for $2K; what’s next, flying pigs?
customer_reviews.text: I love the latest fully loaded iPad Pro. But for just around $2K, I feel Apple is really pushing the price mark.
customer_reviews.author: FireFish

customer_reviews.title: Musicians - you need this!
customer_reviews.text: I am a pianist. This is a game changer. I can put all my music on it (using Musicnotes) and actually see it! The scores ends up being the same size as it was originally. Now I'm addicted to it for everything else as well, I hardly use my computer anymore.
customer_reviews.author: puppitypup

customer_reviews.title: Don’t risk it, buy directly from Apple.
customer_reviews.text: This is not the latest version like the product page says. I bought it with AppleCare + and it clearly said it was the latest model however I received the 3rd generation.
customer_reviews.author: J P

customer_reviews.title: Super amazing
customer_reviews.text: This has honestly changed my life is so amazing I love it. I have no need for a laptop this works fine for everyday needs and any activity’s that cause for me to get online. I have personally equipped mines with the 2nd gen Apple Pencil and Logitech’s slim folio keyboard really giving my iPad the laptop feel without breaking the bank. I’ve had mines for about 4 months I have yet to experience any lag or technical issues. It’s just an all around amazing product
customer_reviews.author: Dontavion

customer_reviews.title: My favorite new toy!
customer_reviews.text: Mine came with a screen defect (not the sellers fault) I had the option of returning for replacement or taking to apple to have it replaced. I chose to return to apple because it was faster and I added applecare too. Overall great ipad cant wait to play with it more!
customer_reviews.author: Cruza726

customer_reviews.title: The most beautiful featureless thing.
customer_reviews.text: Why is the software so incompatible with most useful things? No mouse support or hard drive support? Painful. Movies look amazing and comics too. Definitely an expensive toy.
customer_reviews.author: Earl Gatchalian

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely incredible
customer_reviews.text: I’ve wanted this for 6 months. After 5 days I know I made a great decision. I’ve been using it for drawing and for taking Procreate courses. Being able to have the app open at the same time as the training couldn’t be done on any other tablet in this same way. The colors are mind blowing and Apple Pencil takes it to another level. Many will say WHY? After you use it you’ll know exactly WHY.
customer_reviews.author: Tex

customer_reviews.title: Phenomenal IPad
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this iPad. The sound and picture quality are phenomenal. I’d rather watch movies on this iPad then on my Samsung 4K 55 inch TV. So happy that I purchased the larger iPad. You won’t regret getting the bigger one, but you might be sorry if you don’t.
customer_reviews.author: Carol J. Fisher

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing. My daughter uses it to paint, color, read books, watch netflix, and write papers for school. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely the Best iPad yet!
customer_reviews.text: I've had several iPads over the years. My last was the 10.5" 256gb iPad Pro that I purchased in 2017. The new 12.9" 256gb iPad Pro is phenomenal Especially with the new ipad os 13!! Also purchased the Zagg keyboard and Apple pen gen 2. Incredible. Haven't touched my laptop since.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Thin, lite and powerful.
customer_reviews.text: Went from a 4th gen. iPad to this bad boy. Beautiful screen resolution. Very thin, lite and powerful. Do yourself a favor and get a good protective case to protect your investment. This iPad Pro will need it so you don’t damage it because it is very thin and very expensive. It will add to the weight but will be worth it in the long run, especially if you have small children using it.
customer_reviews.author: Frederick Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Typical great Apple iPad. Read the note about set up with USB-C
customer_reviews.text: Typical great Apple iPad. Note that if you intend to set up the new iPad from a saved backup on a PC, then either that PC needs to have a USB-C port or you will need a USB-A to USB-C adapter cable. One that worked well for me is:
customer_reviews.author: Jack Gadzala

customer_reviews.title: Holding the future in your hands
customer_reviews.text: This ipad pro is amazing. Lighting fast with crystal clear screen. I recommend using it with the apple pencil, it will enhance your experience i promise. The new ipadOS is just the icing on the cake. If your on the fence about making the purchase.. jump over. You wont regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Moran

customer_reviews.title: Use every day?...
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t used for couple days and was prompted to update or restore—had to restore. Hope this isn’t an ongoing issue—because it’s 513gb?...return window is closing in...
customer_reviews.author: Omega

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic piece of technology
customer_reviews.text: A bit of time needed to get used to it as I was only using Macbook before, but now wouldnt go back, perfect for traveling, super fast processor, amazing screen quality eg better than a Macbook Air, long battery life. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: deepsapphyr

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I have issues where iPad doesn’t seem to like my touch. “NOTE:This is ‘NOT’ every time I use iPad” Takes a few time ‘4 to as many as 15’ before it recognizes that I am doing something. Tried multiple fingers. Eventually responds to me. I guess I’m not electric enough. Guess I should have bought the stylus. Maybe down the road I can. But for now I’ll be happy with how the everything else performs.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Ipad
customer_reviews.text: this IPad it good, but its little big, you dont need that big ipad if you have laptop, also its little uncomfortable when watching movie when you are in your bad
customer_reviews.author: mate

customer_reviews.title: Loved it
customer_reviews.text: It is really amazing yet i wished i got the smaller size 11 inch to be handled easily but still i loved it
customer_reviews.author: raef f gorgi

customer_reviews.title: MAGNIFICENT!
customer_reviews.text: I have wanted one for so long, and was finally able to get it. I am more than pleased. Shipping was efficient and quick. Thank you so much.
customer_reviews.author: chazmo44

customer_reviews.title: Amazing tablet
customer_reviews.text: You pay for the name, the size and the wireless capability, it’s not cheap. But if you want to treat yourself and you have the means, go for it. I would advise getting a case with a keyboard, it gives you more screen while being able to type.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT READ THUMB DRIVES. or SDcards
customer_reviews.text: face id security is good. bit the time to recognize the face is to slow. having a laser blown at ur face everytime cause eye irritation
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Angelo

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for the buck!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it on PRIME DAY. What a deal. Couldn't be more happy with the performance of this product. The screen is gorgeous. Perfect for web browsing, watching movies/series, gaming. Apple pencil is a must if you enjoy drawing from time to time. Waiting on iPad OS to unlock this tablet full potential.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Serrano

customer_reviews.title: Happy!!
customer_reviews.text: I was really worried to buy the iPad ,Because was a gift to somebody in Mexico , but I am happy, fair price, excellent packaging, and any problem with the iPad so far... My brother is soo happy...
customer_reviews.author: Jehimy Martín

customer_reviews.title: Abysmal customer support
customer_reviews.text: When I purchased my ipad, I didn't realise the slight bend in the aluminum chassis wasn't part of the design. When I sent my ipad in for repair when blue marks started appearing on the screen- Apple refused to repair my ipad under warranty claiming the bend in the ipad was 'accidental damage'. Upon showing them articles discussing the bending in their aluminum chassis, I was met with feigned ignorance and a refusal to work with me to fix the ipad. To the point where a case manager refused to send me to a customer representative.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Nice upgrade
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my Son. He absolutely absolutely loves it .. perfect for his graphic work
customer_reviews.author: linda kulik

customer_reviews.title: Large screen for everything!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my dad as a birthday present since he can’t see very well. Larger screen than most tablets and definitely worth the cost! The picture is clear and recommend buying the Apple Pencil with it. Definitely love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kristi Kidd

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: I bought this knowing almost everything about It, tons of research, and when I got it... I was actually more surprised at how well done this is, the speakers are nuts!!! Well done Apple
customer_reviews.author: Marc

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding product
customer_reviews.text: Got mine yesterday. 12.9 “ 512 GB 3rd. Gen. It came in a brand new unopened sealed box from Apple. I set it up using my iPhone. So far it’s outstanding. Perfect screen, perfect function. The people who got bent of non functioning iPads, just need to send them back and get a perfect replacement. I’m very happy.....
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Potential laptop replacement....(with Ipad OS, though!)
customer_reviews.text: This is device is powerful with plenty of hardware capabilities. Ipad OS will unlock important features that will enable to use it as a laptop replacement with minor drawbacks, very promising. Be prepare to buy some accessories needed ( usb-c port hub and some connectors) to have plenty of I/O access to your data.
customer_reviews.author: Franklin

customer_reviews.title: For students!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time owning an IPad Pro ( well an iPad in general) and I can’t believe how great it is. I couldn’t believe how fast it goes and how smooth it is. I got this because I want to take notes at the university. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kary

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT GIFT!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my girlfriend and she absolutely loves it. I also love it as well lol. The screen is so smooth and buttery @ 120HZ! The speakers are nice and loud. The Ipad Pro is an absolute beast!
customer_reviews.author: MINK23

customer_reviews.title: Perfect value
customer_reviews.text: Great value, but from this seller I was not able to put apple care on the device because it was a non-apple refurb essentially.
customer_reviews.author: M. Mosher

product_meta.title: Apple iPad Pro (12.9-inch, Wi-Fi, 64GB) - Space Gray (3rd Generation)
feature_bullets: 12.9-inch edge-to-edge Liquid Retina display with ProMotion, True Tone, and wide color
A12X Bionic chip with Neural Engine
Face ID for secure authentication and Apple Pay
12MP back camera, 7MP True Depth front camera
Four speaker audio with wider stereo sound
Up to 10 hours of battery life
USB-C connector for charging and accessories
IOS with group FaceTime, shared augmented reality experiences, screen time, and more
